attributes.action: create a year of events to remember the military successes of 1759 in the Seven Years War
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Next year is the 250th anniversary of many key successes in the Seven Years War. Success in this war was crucial in securing global power for our nation for the next 150 years. If we remember our past heroes and study our history we will have a stronger sense of who we are.
The key battles of 1759 included
1st May conquest of Guadeloupe
1st August victory at Minden
18th August victory at Lagos
13th September victory at Quebec
20th November victory at Quiberon Bay
We were right to remember where we went wrong, e.g. the slave trade, but we should also remember our successes.
